attributes.action: modulate the media to disseminate views to say that kids bodies are not porn
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Porn relates to descriptions of prostitution, assumed to be images, that prostitution being sex for payment.
I sincerely doubt that exploited children are consciously proclaiming themselves prostitutes or receive anything from those who beyond that treat them as prostitutes.
It is probably better to frame a charge on ground of intrusion into privacy with respect to sexual display for which there is a statutory age of consent, compounded with possible theft and evasion of taxation on any 'monies' nominally accrued.

rejection.details: Please rephrase the title of your petition as it is not clear what you are requesting the Government do.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
